channel.title: EternalScape
channel.description:
[url=http://uppit.com/hrxhexpsz87w/EternalScape.jar]http://uppit.com/hrxhexpsz87w/EternalScape.jar[/url] <----Client
[size=20pt]Features:[/size]
[size=10pt]Pvm:
-MartyGore ( Drops Drygore Weapons!) -Nex -Corp -GWD (no killcount) -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens -Steel Kiwi Boss -Nomad (Drops havnt been added) -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen[/size]
[size=10pt]PvP: -Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking[/size]
[size=10pt]Skilling: -Semi low Rate (Non combat) -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed[/size]
[size=10pt]Donatorzone: -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items[/size]
[size=10pt]Other information: -Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators) -Shops replace GE due to the GE bug. But Ge is still in game if wanted. -Home is Mos Le Harmless. -Few Custom Items -Prestige system (sorted shops) -Custom Clothes Changer -Custom Clothes Colour Changer -Full Summoning obelisk -Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE) -Custom emote commands[/size]

item.title: EternalScape
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Give some more global server information, and pictures would be nice.

Read full topic

item.title: EternalScape
item.dc:creator: @EternalMart EternalMart
item.description:
@EternalMart wrote:

http://uppit.com/hrxhexpsz87w/EternalScape.jar <----Client

[size=20pt]Features:[/size]

[size=10pt]Pvm:

-MartyGore ( Drops Drygore Weapons!)
-Nex
-Corp
-GWD (no killcount)
-Tormented Demons
-Evil Chickens
-Steel Kiwi Boss
-Nomad
(Drops havnt been added)
-DKS
-Lucien
-Ice titans
-Sea Troll Queen[/size]

[size=10pt]PvP:
-Safe pvp
-Clan wars (safe/dangerous)
-Death Match Arena
-Wilderness Pking[/size]

[size=10pt]Skilling:
-Semi low Rate (Non combat)
-All skills avaliable
-Max cape rewarded when maxed[/size]

[size=10pt]Donatorzone:
-Donator skilling zone
-Skilling benefits
-Donator Only Items[/size]

[size=10pt]Other information:
-Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators)
-Shops replace GE due to the GE bug. But Ge is still in game if wanted.
-Home is Mos Le Harmless.
-Few Custom Items
-Prestige system (sorted shops)
-Custom Clothes Changer
-Custom Clothes Colour Changer
-Full Summoning obelisk
-Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE)
-Custom emote commands[/size]

Read full topic
